starterRecipes.name: Acorn Bread
starterRecipes.description: A nutritious bread made from ground acorns, flour, and water. Takes time to prepare but provides sustained healing.

starterRecipes.name: Carrot Soup
starterRecipes.description: A steaming cauldron of Frostys Nose stew, brewed from ten enchanted carrots, bone stock, and mandrake. The first sip burns away the chill and knits frostbitten wounds. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.

starterRecipes.name: Cursed Hollow Jack-o'-Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Carve a black pumpkin and let wild sage burn within; its smoke turns the candle's flame neon green.

starterRecipes.name: Enchanted Bloom Jack-o'-Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Blend red and blue pumpkins and infuse the candle with wild flowers to create a violet lantern with smoky pink eyes.

starterRecipes.name: Hand-Poured Candle
starterRecipes.description: Melt pine resin and bind it with plant fiber to craft a small hand-poured candle for light, warmth, or ritual use.

starterRecipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
starterRecipes.description: A sweet and savory pie made from fresh pumpkin, flour, and spices. A delightful treat that provides sustained healing. Heals 2000 hp over 10 seconds.

starterRecipes.name: Rainbow Maize Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Infuse rainbow maize and a candle with wild mushroom spores to create a hallucinogenic, prismatic lantern that bends light into living color.

starterRecipes.name: Roasted Turkey Leg
starterRecipes.description: A rich, savory meal crafted from tender turkey and wild sage. A seasonal favorite said to revive the spirit as well as the body. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.

starterRecipes.name: Solar Grove Jack-o'-Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Carve a green pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild ginseng to create a lantern that glows with living orange light.

starterRecipes.name: Violet Reaper Jack-o'-Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Carve an orange pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild lavender to awaken the Violet Reaper within.

starterRecipes.name: Wisp-Eyed Jack-o'-Lantern
starterRecipes.description: Carve a white pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild mushrooms to summon crimson, ember-like eyes.

starterRecipes.name: Yule Tree
starterRecipes.description: Combine a Treemans Bough with ritual candles, bone, and deer antlers in the kitchen to shape a festive Yule tree.

starterRecipes.name: Enhancement Stone

allRecipes.name: Acorn Bread
allRecipes.description: A nutritious bread made from ground acorns, flour, and water. Takes time to prepare but provides sustained healing.

allRecipes.name: Carrot Soup
allRecipes.description: A steaming cauldron of Frostys Nose stew, brewed from ten enchanted carrots, bone stock, and mandrake. The first sip burns away the chill and knits frostbitten wounds. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.

allRecipes.name: Cursed Hollow Jack-o'-Lantern
allRecipes.description: Carve a black pumpkin and let wild sage burn within; its smoke turns the candle's flame neon green.

allRecipes.name: Enchanted Bloom Jack-o'-Lantern
allRecipes.description: Blend red and blue pumpkins and infuse the candle with wild flowers to create a violet lantern with smoky pink eyes.

allRecipes.name: Hand-Poured Candle
allRecipes.description: Melt pine resin and bind it with plant fiber to craft a small hand-poured candle for light, warmth, or ritual use.

allRecipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
allRecipes.description: A sweet and savory pie made from fresh pumpkin, flour, and spices. A delightful treat that provides sustained healing. Heals 2000 hp over 10 seconds.

allRecipes.name: Rainbow Maize Lantern
allRecipes.description: Infuse rainbow maize and a candle with wild mushroom spores to create a hallucinogenic, prismatic lantern that bends light into living color.

allRecipes.name: Roasted Turkey Leg
allRecipes.description: A rich, savory meal crafted from tender turkey and wild sage. A seasonal favorite said to revive the spirit as well as the body. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.

allRecipes.name: Solar Grove Jack-o'-Lantern
allRecipes.description: Carve a green pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild ginseng to create a lantern that glows with living orange light.

allRecipes.name: Violet Reaper Jack-o'-Lantern
allRecipes.description: Carve an orange pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild lavender to awaken the Violet Reaper within.

allRecipes.name: Wisp-Eyed Jack-o'-Lantern
allRecipes.description: Carve a white pumpkin and infuse the candle with wild mushrooms to summon crimson, ember-like eyes.

allRecipes.name: Yule Tree
allRecipes.description: Combine a Treemans Bough with ritual candles, bone, and deer antlers in the kitchen to shape a festive Yule tree.
